name: Creamy Cones
description:
Do you like cream cones? The studio is promoting their products, if you can help them make more creamy cones, you will be rewarded!

Sounds great? The steps are easy, choose the same cone and cream shapes at first, then put the same toppings on the cream.

That's it! You really did a good job, now make as many creamy cones as you can!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Plenty of cones, cream shapes and toppings are prepared
* No time limited, enjoy yourself
